CSGO isn't so great? Are you kidding me? Where else can you find a game with such beautiful graphics and silky smooth gunplay? CSGO puts the idea of gaming in another level and we will be lucky to see another game quite like CSGO in our lifetime. MInecraft breaks records. Fortnite breaks records. CSGO breaks the rules. -This is my favorite game
-it's super fun alone and with friends
-It's different from other first person shooters
-you can play many different gamemodes like competitive, gun game, deathmatch, workshop maps and, online surf
-you should buy this game and not play for free because there are to many cheaters on it, although there are some cheaters on the prime version but it's pretty rare
-overall awesome game
